More examplesFewer examplesI can honestly say that I have no interest whatsoever in the royal family.He answered openly and honestly without any hesitation."You played brilliantly in the concert." [ not gradable ] used to emphasize that you are telling the truth: I honestly don’t know what I did to upset her. Honestly, I wish I had time to do more reading.
honestly adverb
(IN TRUTHFUL WAY)
